description:
A talkative, bubbly and happy-go-lucky girl. She is very fond of Ren, who is her childhood friend.
Nora is a little moody and tends to get into mischief, but she has great insight such as noticing Pyrrhaâ€™s feelings for Jaune.
She is an immensely powerful fighter who wields a large hammer called Magnhild.
Source: Official site
name: Nora Valkyrie
